languages.text: {n}Вы стараетесь осторожно подвинуть к себе со стола ничейную плитку, но делаете это столь неуклюже, что немедленно оказываетесь под перекрестным обстрелом возмущенных взглядов. Вы делаете вид, что тянулись за кубком, не теша себя надеждой, что смогли кого-нибудь обмануть.{/n}

{n}You try to carefully move an unclaimed tile toward you on the table, but you do it so clumsily that you immediately find yourself in the sights of several outraged smugglers. You pretend that you were simply reaching for your goblet, but you do not kid yourself that anyone is taken in by your act.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы стараетесь осторожно подвинуть к себе со стола ничейную плитку, но делаете это столь неуклюже, что немедленно оказываетесь под перекрестным обстрелом возмущенных взглядов. Вы делаете вид, что тянулись за кубком, не теша себя надеждой, что смогли кого-нибудь обмануть.{/n}

You pretend that you were simply reaching for your goblet, but you do not kid yourself that anyone is taken in by your act.{/n}

{n}You try to carefully move an unclaimed tile toward you on the table, but you do it so clumsily that you immediately find yourself in the sights of several outraged smugglers. You pretend that you were simply reaching for your goblet, but you do not kid yourself that anyone is taken in by your act.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你小心翼翼，试图地将一张没人要的牌扫到自己手中，但你的动作实在是太笨拙了，几个走私者立刻朝你投来了愤怒的视线。你假装只是想去拿酒杯，但你心知肚明，恐怕不会有人真的会相信你的借口。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to carefully move an unclaimed tile toward you on the table, but you do it so clumsily that you immediately find yourself in the sights of several outraged smugglers. You pretend that you were simply reaching for your goblet, but you do not kid yourself that anyone is taken in by your act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你小心翼翼，试图地将一张没人要的牌扫到自己手中，但你的动作实在是太笨拙了，几个走私者立刻朝你投来了愤怒的视线。你假装只是想去拿酒杯，但你心知肚明，恐怕不会有人真的会相信你的借口。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはテーブルの上の手付かずのタイルを注意深く手前に運ぼうとしたが、あまりに不器用なため、たちまち憤慨した数人の密輸人の視線にさらされてしまった。あなたは単にゴブレットに手を伸ばしたふりをしたが、その動きに騙された者は誰もいないだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to carefully move an unclaimed tile toward you on the table, but you do it so clumsily that you immediately find yourself in the sights of several outraged smugglers. You pretend that you were simply reaching for your goblet, but you do not kid yourself that anyone is taken in by your act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはテーブルの上の手付かずのタイルを注意深く手前に運ぼうとしたが、あまりに不器用なため、たちまち憤慨した数人の密輸人の視線にさらされてしまった。あなたは単にゴブレットに手を伸ばしたふりをしたが、その動きに騙された者は誰もいないだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas mover una ficha libre hacia ti en la mesa, pero lo haces con tanta torpeza que pronto te miran varios contrabandistas ultrajados. Finges que solo querías coger tu cáliz, pero no te haces ilusiones de haber engañado a nadie. {/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to carefully move an unclaimed tile toward you on the table, but you do it so clumsily that you immediately find yourself in the sights of several outraged smugglers. You pretend that you were simply reaching for your goblet, but you do not kid yourself that anyone is taken in by your act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas mover una ficha libre hacia ti en la mesa, pero lo haces con tanta torpeza que pronto te miran varios contrabandistas ultrajados. Finges que solo querías coger tu cáliz, pero no te haces ilusiones de haber engañado a nadie. {/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tentez discrètement de faire glisser une tuile isolée vers vous, mais votre maladresse est telle que vous vous retrouvez instantanément sous le feu du regard de plusieurs contrebandiers passablement mécontents. Vous faites mine d'avoir simplement cherché à saisir votre verre, mais vous avez bien conscience que personne n'est dupe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to carefully move an unclaimed tile toward you on the table, but you do it so clumsily that you immediately find yourself in the sights of several outraged smugglers. You pretend that you were simply reaching for your goblet, but you do not kid yourself that anyone is taken in by your act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tentez discrètement de faire glisser une tuile isolée vers vous, mais votre maladresse est telle que vous vous retrouvez instantanément sous le feu du regard de plusieurs contrebandiers passablement mécontents. Vous faites mine d'avoir simplement cherché à saisir votre verre, mais vous avez bien conscience que personne n'est dupe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst einen unbenutzten Stein auf dem Tisch vorsichtig in deine Richtung zu verschieben, stellst dich dabei aber so ungeschickt an, dass du von mehreren Schmuggler gleichzeitig erwischt wirst und Empörung auslöst. Du tust so, als hättest du nur nach deinem Becher greifen wollen, aber dir ist absolut klar, dass niemand auf deinen kleinen Akt hereinfällt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to carefully move an unclaimed tile toward you on the table, but you do it so clumsily that you immediately find yourself in the sights of several outraged smugglers. You pretend that you were simply reaching for your goblet, but you do not kid yourself that anyone is taken in by your act.{/n}

Du tust so, als hättest du nur nach deinem Becher greifen wollen, aber dir ist absolut klar, dass niemand auf deinen kleinen Akt hereinfällt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Boştaki karoyu dikkatli bir şekilde önüne çekmeye çalışırken sakarlık ediyorsun ve kendini, öfkeli kaçakçıların dik bakışlarına maruz kalmış hâlde buluyorsun. Sadece kadehine uzanıyormuş gibi davranıyorsun ama bu kötü oyunculuğunla kimseyi kandıramıyorsun.{/n}

You pretend that you were simply reaching for your goblet, but you do not kid yourself that anyone is taken in by your act.{/n}
